Texts.Chs: 把^orange;伊格纳斯辣椒种子^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我已经迫不及待要试试到底它能辣到什么程度了！
Texts.Eng: I can't wait to make some chili with these!

Texts.Chs: 我非常喜欢充满辣味的料理，虽然烹饪它会有些难受。能麻烦你使用^orange;基因合成器^white;为我制作一些^green;伊格纳斯辣椒种子^reset;吗？我会给你一些奖励的。
Texts.Eng: I love spicy foods but getting what I need here is a pain. Using a ^orange;Gene Design Lab^white; could you perhaps ^green;make me some Ignus Chili seeds?^reset;. I'd reward you for the effort.
